overview: Ron Jeremy stars in this torrid throwback, playing a ‘high roller’ who keeps finding himself in one sticky situation after another. His girlfriend Sheri St. Clair wants in on the action, and she shows that she’s willing to treat both Ron and his business partner to some salacious sizzle. Meanwhile, Sheri’s roommate Jessica Wylde is enjoying some very public fun, favoring Peter North with some wild oral hi jinx. The wildest of the bunch, though, is slender Summer Rose, who goes all-out to please Ron and his partner. She even delves into some delirious DP dilly-dallying, driving both guys right over the edge. It’s a non-stop display of passion and energy that delivers from start to feverish finish!
title: Greek Mistress
